channel.title: Colours
channel.description:
This might go in the Client Help section? sorry if i'm wrong...
I want to know how people get different colour id's for whips.(i want to colour whips) I know poeple hate customs, but some people like them(its for donator shop lol) So is there some sort of colour id generator tool of some sort? if not then can somebody post me a list or a guide of how to get the colour id's to change the colour of the whips or another item.
~~Thanks

item.title: Colours
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

Yorchi elite:

Hm, you change the id in your client i can maybe help you out.

What do you mean? :o

wiwihauw:

And most probably YOU will get an $100,000 bill for earning money of private servers.

Well i hope i don’t
